Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer local rightArm
local rightGrip
Tool.Enabled = true
local runService = game:service("RunService")
local damage = 21
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local runService = game:service("RunService")
local slashAnim local throwAnim local swordWalkAnim local waveSlashAnim local swordFromHolsterAnim local twoHandedAnim
function throwHamma(key) key = key:lower() if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
if math.random() < 0.11 then hit:BreakJoints() end
local opponent = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") wait(0.1) if opponent then local bodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bodyVelocity.P = 100000 bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P) bodyVelocity.velocity = (opponent.Position - myTorso.Position) * 8.5 bodyVelocity.Parent = opponent debris:AddItem(bodyVelocity, 0.75) end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
local swordWave = Tool:FindFirstChild("SwordWave") --if swordWave and swordWave.Value == true then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if Tool.Grip == CFrame.new(0.649999976, 0, 0.649999976, 0.709901273, -0, -0.704301238, -0.704301238, 0, -0.709901273, 0, 1, -0) then swordHolsterAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SwordHolsterAnim) if swordHolsterAnim then swordHolsterAnim:Play() end wait(0.5) if rightGrip then rightGrip.Part0 = rightArm end Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.70000005, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0, 1, -0, 0) wait(0.7) if swordWalkAnim then swordWalkAnim:Stop() end twoHandedAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.TwoHandedAnim) if twoHandedAnim then twoHandedAnim:Play() end Tool.Enabled = true else if t - dashTime < 0.2 then throwAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ThrowAnim) if throwAnim then throwAnim:Play() end if swordWave and swordWave.Value == false then swordWave.Value = true end else slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Slash) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end Tool.Enabled = true end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(throwHamma) end if myHumanoid then swordWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SwordWalkAnim) if swordWalkAnim then swordWalkAnim:Play() end end
if rightArm then while rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") == nil do wait() end rightGrip = rightArm.RightGrip rightGrip.Part0 = myTorso end
Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0.649999976, 0, 0.649999976, 0.709901273, -0, -0.704301238, -0.704301238, 0, -0.709901273, 0, 1, -0) end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if throwAnim then throwAnim:Stop() end if swordWalkAnim then swordWalkAnim:Stop() end if swordHolsterAnim then swordHolsterAnim:Stop() end if twoHandedAnim then twoHandedAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local damage = 13
local swordWave
local holster local holsterMesh local holsterWeld
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local hammerClone
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if hit:FindFirstChild("Fire") == nil then local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = hit fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 204/255, 1) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 0, 1)
debris:AddItem(fire, 3) end
local torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if torso and not torso:FindFirstChild("HammerBV") then local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "HammerBV" bv.P = 50000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(bv.P, bv.P, bv.P) bv.velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 15.0 debris:AddItem(bv, 1.25)
humanoid.Sit = true end
if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("FreezingHammerSlowScript") == nil then local freezeScript = Tool.FreezingHammerSlowScript:Clone() --freezeScript.Parent = hit.Parent --freezeScript.Disabled = false end end end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Holster") == nil and myTorso ~= nil then
holster = Instance.new("Part") holster.FormFactor = 3 holster.Name = "Holster" holster.Size = Vector3.new(2, 0.2, 4) holster.Shape = "Block" holster.Parent = vCharacter holster.CanCollide = false
holsterMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") holsterMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71380981" holsterMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) holsterMesh.Name = "Mesh" holsterMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=71381010" holsterMesh.Parent = holster
holsterWeld = Instance.new("Weld") holsterWeld.Part0 = myTorso holsterWeld.Part1 = holster holsterWeld.Name = "HolsterHolder" holsterWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0.200000048, -0.649999976, -0.70710659, 0.707106829, -1.78813934e-007, -0.707106829, -0.70710659, -2.84217094e-014, -1.26440554e-007, 1.26440526e-007, 1) holsterWeld.Parent = myTorso end end
function onUnequipped() if holster then holster:Destroy() end if holsterWeld then holsterWeld:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("SwordWave") == nil do wait() end
swordWave = Tool.SwordWave
swordWave.Changed:connect(function() if myTorso and myHumanoid and swordWave and swordWave.Value == true then --[[hammerClone = Sword:Clone()
hammerClone.CFrame = Sword.CFrame --* CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi/2, 0)
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.Parent = hammerClone float.force = Vector3.new(0, hammerClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0)
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position).unit
wait(0.30) Sword.Transparency = 1.0 hammerClone.Velocity = direction * 60.0 hammerClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(20, 0, 0)
hammerClone.Parent = game.Workspace hammerClone.Touched:connect(blow)
debris:AddItem(hammerClone, 5) Tool.Enabled = false wait(9.0) Sword.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true wait(5.0) swordWave.Value = false ]] end end)
